Title: easyadmin-extension-bundle action case insensitivity
Description: In alterphp/easyadmin-extension-bundle, role based access rules do not handle action name case sensitivity which may lead to unauthorized access.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.2.0 before 1.2.11, all versions starting from 1.3.0 before 1.3.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.2.0, all versions starting from 1.2.11 before 1.3.0, all versions starting from 1.3.1
